mapper.select: select manuname,orderstatus, reqorder from (select m.manuname, p.orderstatus, p.reqorder, row_number() over(order by p.reqorder desc) as rnum from production p, manufacturer m where m.id = p.manuid) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY reqorder DESC

select expname,status, reqdate from (select e.expname, c.status, c.reqdate, row_number() over(order by c.reqdate desc) as rnum from expert e, consulting c where e.id = c.expid) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY reqdate DESC
